        Sends a SOAP request
        Parameters:
        endPointURL - The complete url end point, including http or https, the host, the port and the end point
        xmlRequest - The xml request body of the soap message
        action - The action

        The response
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • sendSoap

                                java.lang.String fileData)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a SOAP request attaching a file
        Parameters:
        endpointURL - The complete url end point, including http or https, the host, the port and the end point
        xmlRequest - The xml request body of the soap message
        action - The action
        fileName - The file name
        fileData - The content of the file
        Returns:
        The response
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
